Title: Should You Join Xiaohongshu Mall?
Content: Deciding whether to join Xiaohongshu Mall depends on your brand's goals and product type. While Xiaohongshu Mall may not generate as high sales as established platforms like Taobao or Tmall, it offers significant brand exposure due to its large user base of over 200 million users and 85 million monthly active users. Brands that join Xiaohongshu Mall often see an increase in brand awareness. Additionally, Xiaohongshu allows you to directly link your products in promotional posts, making it easier for users to purchase. However, if your primary goal is to maximize sales, you might find better results on more established e-commerce platforms. Evaluate your brand's needs and product type to determine if Xiaohongshu Mall is the right fit for you.

Title: Beware of Third-Party Agents
Content: When considering joining Xiaohongshu Mall, be cautious of third-party agents who claim that registration is difficult and that only they can secure a spot for you. These agents often charge high fees for services that you can perform yourself. Xiaohongshu Mall's registration process is straightforward and can be completed by following the official guidelines. There are no exclusive quotas or special access that agents can provide. Instead of relying on agents, take the time to understand the registration process and prepare the necessary documents. This approach will save you money and ensure that you are not falling victim to scams. Always refer to Xiaohongshu's official resources for accurate information.

Title: Steps to Register on Xiaohongshu Mall
Content: Registering on Xiaohongshu Mall involves several steps that require careful preparation of documents. First, ensure that you are a registered business, as individual accounts cannot register. You will need to provide company information, including contact details, business address, and shipping address. Additionally, you must submit business credentials such as a unified business license, tax registration certificate, and organizational code certificate. Financial information, including bank account details, is also required. The registration process includes six main steps: registering on the merchant system, submitting information, uploading documents, signing contracts, and completing system training. The entire process can take about a week if all documents are correctly prepared. Refer to Xiaohongshu's official website for detailed instructions and support.
